name: Real Gangster Sniper Shooter: Assassin Game
name_original: Real Gangster Sniper Shooter: Assassin Game
description:
Gangsters and mafia have taken over the city. They are spreading chaos and extreme terror making survival difficult. Being an elite force officer you have been assigned special task. Crime activates in survival city is extreme high being a real sniper survival hero you can save the modern city using assault sniper rifle to eliminate terrorists, gangster with super survival sniper power. In sniper hero crime city survival: best shooter game you need to play a role of real super hero of modern elite force officer who is on the undercover mission to gun down the bad elements of crime city.


Take the head shots! Be the real survival shooter and prove your extreme shooting skills. Don’t let bad elements be successful in their dirty planning, our sources have disclosed the meeting locations. Be careful while shooting them if you miss fire they will run away and you won’t be able to hunt them down again in this best shooter game recommended for you. Every shot counts and every bullet must blow enemies head. Ruin criminal’s strategy to prove yourself as the real sniper hero of survival city in an amazing FPS game.


Features:
10 non-stop action packed levels
Kill & prove yourself as the best survival hero
Thrilling action packed FPS game of 2017
Master real sniping skills with best assault rifles
Multiple targets to aim and shoot
3d graphics, cool animations & sound effects


Download this game and give us your feedback, so we can make more new games.
